subject: Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
Witnesses
Baseball
Perjury
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Brian McNamee, the former trainer to Roger Clemens, spent his fifth day on the stand under harsh cross-examination by Rusty Hardin, Clemens’s lead lawyer in his perjury trial.
snippet: Brian McNamee, the former trainer to Roger Clemens, spent his fifth day on the stand under harsh cross-examination by Rusty Hardin, Clemens’s lead lawyer in his perjury trial.
